thread.title: Ravi Kishan honoured with 'Icon of the Year' award
thread.title_full: Ravi Kishan honoured with 'Icon of the Year' award - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ravi Kishan honoured with 'Icon of the Year' award
text:
Bhojpuri superstar Ravi Kishan has been honoured with 'Icon of the Year' award. At arecently held event in Goa, Ravi Kishan's contributions to the industry were applauded and he was honoured with the award.
Ravi Kishan is known for experimenting with his looks and even at the event he appeared with a totally new look. He also revealed that this look was for his upcoming film in Telugu. After 'Kick 2' Ravi Kishan has also emerged as a sought after actor in the Telugu film industry.
Source: Bhojpurimedia.com
